comments:
N20050517-0010

JDT Text Performance tests which used to run now fail with an NPE in
JobErrorDialog.refresh(...) line 92, for details see:
http://relengbuildserv.ottawa.ibm.com/downloads/master/downloads/drops/N20050517-0010/performance/html/org.eclipse.jdt.text.tests_win32perf2.html#PerformanceTestSuite

It only happened on one test machine.

We aren't checking the AUTOMATED flag and so we are trying to update a dialog
that was never created. This should only even happen in suites.

Dani is it easy for us to run these tests or is it complicated?

Tod, running the tests is easy: checkout org.eclipse.jdt.text.tests and run the
PerformanceTestSuite as JUnit plug-in test. However, it's probably not easily
reproducible: it only failed on one machine but not on the other three, so I
guess it was an intermittent problem that triggered this.
